Play the selcted tracks in the Grim Garten.

TO MAKE THE END OF BATTLE

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking items, you can change the BGM via [Epstein Workshop] -> [BGM Change Service] menu within the Grim Garten.
*Digital Deluxe Edition and Digital Ultimate Edition and Premier Pass are also available. Beware of duplicate purchases.
